attributes.action: When Are You Going to Apologise for the lies about the deficit ?
attributes.additional_details:
It is time that Cameron and Osborne started telling the truth
CLAIM 1
The last government left the biggest debt in the developed world. UNTRUE

CLAIM 2
Labour created the biggest deficit in the developed world by overspending. UNTRUE

CLAIM 3
Our borrowing costs are low because the markets have confidence in George Osborne's austerity plan and without it the UK will end up like Greece.UNTRUE

Please see below article that outlines the above:

http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/ramesh-patel/growth-cameron-austerity_b_2007552.html
